Semester Project 2: Ecomstore

Project Links

Live Site GitHub Repository

Project Description

Ecomstore is a modern e-commerce platform allowing users to browse products, manage their carts, and complete checkouts. It includes a backend for product management and user account handling. The project showcases my skills in React, state management, and API work.

Reflections & Improvements

  • Improved accessibility by correctly associating labels with their input fields using htmlFor in React.
  • Replaced array indices used as keys in list rendering with stable, unique identifiers for better rendering performance.
  • Cleaned up excessive empty lines to improve code readability and maintain consistency.
  • Replaced unnecessary let declarations with const to make the code more predictable and maintainable.
